name: The Apprentice Toymaker
description:
This is my entry for Brackey's game jam 2020 with the theme Rewind.

Original plan was to make a puzzle game, but I ended up changing it midway to a simon says-type of game.

Credits:

  • Code and art by me
  • SFX from OwlishMedia
  • BGM from Purple Planet
  • Made with Phaser
